name: Skyrena
description:
Take your fight to the skies!

As part of CGX Jam 2020, this prototype was in 48 hours between Friday May 1st and May 3rd 2020.

Skyrena is the arena of wishes, letting the player choose an upgrade between each stage. Fight your way through slimes and the dreaded dummy boss.

Credits :

Abner Balboa - Art

Christopher Chin - Art

Landon Grant - Lead, Design, Programming

Samuel Bujold-Bouchard - Programming

Tyler Betts'O-Donnell - Programming
